FEATURE_1_BODY: Experience hassle-free purchases directly on the blockchain, ensuring transparency and security for every transaction.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Browse through a diverse range of products, all available for purchase using your preferred cryptocurrency.

FEATURE_4_BODY: Use popular cryptocurrencies to make purchases, with real-time conversion rates and low transaction fees.

FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about buying goods on the blockchain
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Onchain purchasing refers to buying goods directly on a blockchain network, using cryptocurrencies or tokens. It offers increased transparency, security, and efficiency compared to traditional e-commerce.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I get started with buying goods onchain?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: To get started, you'll need a cryptocurrency wallet and some crypto funds. Simply connect your wallet to our app, browse the available products, and complete your purchase using your preferred cryptocurrency.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, onchain purchases are generally very secure. Transactions are recorded on the blockchain, making them transparent and immutable. We also implement additional security measures to protect your personal information and funds.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What cryptocurrencies can I use for purchases?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Our app supports a variety of popular cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and several stablecoins. The exact list of accepted currencies can be found in the payment section of our app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How long does it take to receive my purchased goods?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Delivery times vary depending on the product and your location. While the onchain transaction is nearly instant, physical goods still need to be shipped. Digital goods are typically delivered immediately after the transaction is confirmed on the blockchain.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: On-chain purchasing utilizes blockchain technology to facilitate secure, transparent transactions. When you buy goods through our app, the transaction is recorded on the blockchain, ensuring immutability and traceability.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What cryptocurrencies can I use for purchases?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Our app currently supports popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, and our native token. We're continually working to expand the range of accepted cryptocurrencies to provide more options for our users.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How secure are transactions on your platform?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Security is our top priority. All transactions are protected by advanced cryptography and recorded on the blockchain, making them highly secure and resistant to fraud. Additionally, we implement multi-factor authentication and regular security audits to ensure the safety of your assets and personal information.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What are the benefits of buying goods on-chain?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Buying goods on-chain offers several advantages, including increased transparency, reduced transaction fees, faster settlement times, and the ability to make purchases without intermediaries. It also provides a global marketplace accessible to anyone with an internet connection and cryptocurrency.
